mapper.sql: id, username, pay_pwd, password, salt, email, telephone, birthday, gender, balance

mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_pwd = #{payPwd,jdbcType=CHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=CHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_pwd = #{payPwd,jdbcType=CHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=CHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
